Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

Attributes.description: The list of CPLD attributes and their values as determined by the manufacturer or provider.
Attributes.longDescription: This property shall contain the list of CPLD attributes and their values as determined by the manufacturer or provider.  This object shall describe CPLD attribute settings as additional properties.  If the object specifies a CPLD attribute registry, attributes shall be looked up in that attribute registry by their attribute name.  Attributes in this attribute registry with the AttributeType of `Enumeration` shall use valid ValueName values in this object, as listed in that attribute registry.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Cpld.description: The Cpld schema contains properties related to the CPLD attribute registry.  The attribute registry describes the system-specific CPLD attributes and actions for changing to CPLD settings.  Changes to the CPLD typically require a system reset before they take effect.  It is likely that a client finds the `@Redfish.Settings` term in this resource, and if it is found, the client makes requests to change CPLD settings by modifying the resource identified by the `@Redfish.Settings` term.
Cpld.longDescription: This resource shall represent CPLD attributes for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AttributeRegistry.description: The resource ID of the attribute registry that has the system-specific information about a CPLD resource.
AttributeRegistry.longDescription: The link to the attribute registry that lists the metadata describing the CPLD attribute settings in this resource.

Attributes.description: The list of CPLD attributes specific to the manufacturer or provider.
Attributes.longDescription: This property shall contain the list of CPLD attributes specific to the manufacturer or provider.  CPLD attribute settings appear as additional properties in this object, and can be looked up in the attribute registry by their AttributeName.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

ResetCPLDToDefaultsPending.description: An indication of whether there is a pending request to reset the CPLD attributes to default values.
ResetCPLDToDefaultsPending.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether there is a pending request to reset the CPLD attributes to default values.  A successful completion of the ResetCPLD action shall set this property to `true`.  Applying the default attribute values to this resource shall set this property to `false`.  Services may reject modification requests to the settings resource if this property contains `true`.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ActiveSoftwareImage.description: The link to the software inventory that represents the active CPLD firmware image.
ActiveSoftwareImage.longDescription: This property shall contain a link a resource of type SoftwareInventory that represents the active CPLD firmware image.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

SoftwareImages.description: The images that are associated with this CPLD.
SoftwareImages.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type SoftwareInventory that represent the firmware images that apply to this CPLD.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
